testcase.name: Register a customer
testcase.system-out: Given The customer registration page is loaded..............................passed When Manager fills required fields too add a new customer...................passed Then Manager will see a popup with the confirmation of register.............passed

testcase.name: Open account
testcase.system-out: Given The open account page is loaded.......................................passed When Manager selects options to add new account.............................passed Then Manager will see a popup with the confirmation of account created......passed

testcase.name: Delete customer
testcase.system-out: Given The customers page is loaded..........................................passed When Manager searches an account to delete..................................passed Then Account deleted not will see in list of customers......................passed

testcase.name: Login with customer
testcase.system-out: Given Login page as customer is loaded......................................passed When User selects his username to login.....................................passed Then User will see a scream to manage their accounts........................passed

testcase.name: Deposit in an account
testcase.system-out: Given The section for deposit is loaded.....................................passed When User enters amount to deposit..........................................passed Then User will see a message confirming the deposit.........................passed

testcase.name: withdraw money
testcase.system-out: Given The section for withdraw is loaded....................................passed When User enter amount to withdraw..........................................passed Then User will see a massage confirming the withdraw........................passed
